channel.title: Need autofisher for Mystera Legends -- Paying 5M RSGP
channel.description:
I recently started playing the game Mystera Legends, and it's pretty easy to cheat on there. :) Although, I need an autofisher for it.. It needs to have the cursor right click twice to enable the magic targeting, and then find a fish and target it. Then it needs to click the fishing pole 'till the fish is caught. You can change the picture of the fish in the monsters folder, I think the best one would be red. The game does lighten and darken the screen randomly, and your character will be taken to "Away From Keyboard Land" if you stay in one spot too long. And I need a logout feature if it runs out of bait.. =\ Oh yeah, the admin doesn't care if people macro, so please feel free to make a script fast. NO ANTIBAN FEATURES, if you want. :) Here's the site to DL the game at: http://www.mysteralegends.com/rpgbeta/index.php
Also, [b]I will pay you 5M+ RSGP or money in ML if you make me this script.[/b]
I'll be on the characters Kat and Tanket. Have fun. :)
P.S. There is a newby place you have to go through before you even get to start fishing.. :( But it's pretty quick, you need level 10. After you get out message me if I'm on(on Kat or Tanket) and I'll give you a fishing pole and some bait for use with making the macro. :) Thanks!
[b]----------[/b]
Please contact me on:
[b]AIM:[/b] angelcutie102938 [b]Yahoo:[/b] angelcutie102938 [b]Ingame(Mystera Legends):[/b] Kat or Tanket

item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I’ll do it. It doesnt seem that hard. Can you explain to me what you do when you fish? (click on something… etc) Because I really dont understand this game.

item.title: Need autofisher for Mystera Legends -- Paying 5M RSGP
item.dc:creator: @liamhtwozere liamhtwozere
item.description:
@liamhtwozere wrote:

:mad: :eek: :rolleyes: :o

give the money to squireliamht wots ur user

can i have it RSGP please

Version: Beta

Setup:
*Start near fishing spot
*Make sure net is in 1st Slot.

Theres alot of bugs
No antirandoms added yet =(

Adding:
Antirandoms
Faster autoing
And much more.Code:
{
o-o o–o o o o o
| \ | | |\ | | |
| O o-o o o o-o o-o o-o O–o o-o o o oo-o o-o | \ | o-o -o- -o- o-o o-o
| / | | | | | | | | | | | \ / \ / |-’ | | | |-’ | | |-’ |
o-o o o–O o o o-o o o o-o o o o-o o o o o-o o o o-o o
| || Made by: Sean
o–o || Help From : BucklyInDaHouse + The Scar Noob.

}
program DrynorPowerNetter;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/Fishing.scar}

// Finds the fishing area
procedure Fish;
begin
repeat
SetUpSRL;
if (FindColorSpiral(x,y,15198954,500,700,700,500)) then
MMouse(x,y,2,2);
wait(100+random(50));
if IsUpTextMulti(‘Fish’,‘ish’,‘Net’) then
wait(2000+random(400));
Mouse(x,y,2,2,true);
until(InvFull);
end;

// Droping part
procedure Drop;
begin
DropTo(2,28);
end;
begin
repeat
Fish;
Drop;
until(false);
end.

Read full topic
